Headline: #53 PulaskiTemporary Reroute at Pulaski/31st
ShortDescription: #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 31st, Lawndale, 26th and Pulaski due to fire department activity near Pulaski/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 31st, Lawndale, 26th, then will resume their normal route on Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to fire department activity near Pulaski/31st.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Oak Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Oak Park due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Oak Park due to a mechanical problem.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#91 Austin

#50 Damen

#82 Kimball/Homan

#52 Kedzie

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
